nodes.text: The Star Fortress over Balmorra was a Star Fortress deployed by Emperor Arcann of the Eternal Empire to watch for possible uprisings on the planet. It was commanded by Exarch Malforia, known for her ruthless ferocity and the fixation on Tyth, one of the Zakuulan Old Gods. However, replicator droids of the Shroud destroyed the Star Fortress and took Malforia prisoner to study her fanaticism.
The Balmorran Star Fortress is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the codex entry obtained during Interlude: Shroud of Memory.
